name: Valve cover gasket
description: A new high quality gasket to fix oil leaks coming from your valve cover. The set contains one valve cover gasket and 6 spark plug tube o-rings.

name: Intake manifold gasket
description: A new high quality gasket to for your intake manifold.

name: Windscreen wipers
description: Featuring a new design that will clear rain and insect gunk from your windscreen like never before!

name: Tyres
description: High quality tyres for impeccable handling around the fast food restaurant carpark of your choice.

name: Exhaust
description: A shiny new exhaust, complete with vanity cover for that extra bling factor!
